text: Can the switch statement have more than one variable?
The question is based in all the languages that use the switch block (C++, C# PHP , Java , Python and so on).
So is it possible to have something like this?

code:
switch (var1, var2)
case  var1 = a:
    something
    break;
case var2 = b:
    something
    break;
case var1 = 0 ,var2 = 1
     etc...
